snippet.title: Radiangames Inferno Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Inferno is a twin-stick action RPG for Xbox 360 that supports 1-4 players. Explore 30 levels, collect gold, upgrade your ship, and destroy everything in your path.

Inferno is the third game in the radiangames series for XBLIG.
